verses.verse: A Psalm of David, when he was in the wilderness of Judah. O <S%H430>God<s%>, thou art my <S%H410>God<s%>; earnestly will I <S%H7836>seek<s%> <S%H5315>thee<s%>: My soul <S%H6770>thirsteth<s%> for <S%H1320>thee<s%>, my flesh <S%H3642>longeth<s%> for <S%H6723>thee<s%>, In a dry and <S%H5889>weary<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>, where <S%H1097>no<s%> water <S%H4325>is<s%>.
So have I <S%H2372>looked<s%> upon thee in the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, To <S%H7200>see<s%> thy <S%H5797>power<s%> and thy <S%H3519>glory<s%>.
Because thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H2416>life<s%>, My <S%H8193>lips<s%> shall praise <S%H7623>thee<s%>.
So will I <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee while I <S%H2416>live<s%>: I will lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> in thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.

My <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> as with <S%H2459>marrow<s%> and <S%H1880>fatness<s%>; And my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall <S%H1984>praise<s%> thee with <S%H7445>joyful<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%>;
When I <S%H2142>remember<s%> thee upon my <S%H3326>bed<s%>, And <S%H1897>meditate<s%> on thee in the <S%H821>night-watches<s%>.
For thou hast been my <S%H5833>help<s%>, And in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of thy <S%H3671>wings<s%> will I <S%H7442>rejoice<s%>.
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> followeth <S%H1692>hard<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3225>thee<s%>: Thy right hand upholdeth <S%H8551>me<s%>.
But those that <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, to <S%H7722>destroy<s%> <S%H935>it<s%>, Shall go into the lower <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
They shall be given <S%H5064>over<s%> to the power of the <S%H3027>sword<s%>: They shall be a <S%H4521>portion<s%> for <S%H7776>foxes<s%>.

But the <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in <S%H430>God<s%>: Every one that <S%H7650>sweareth<s%> by him shall <S%H1984>glory<s%>; For the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of them that <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%> shall be <S%H5534>stopped<s%>.
